dr-mital-patel.name: Dr. Mital Patel, OD
dr-mital-patel.title: Doctor of Optometry
dr-mital-patel.bio: Dr. Mital Patel is the founder of Classic Vision Care, serving Kennesaw and East Cobb/Marietta for over 25 years. She earned her Doctor of Optometry from the Southern College of Optometry and specializes in dry eye treatment, specialty contact lenses, and comprehensive eye care. Dr. Patel is certified in IPL, radio-frequency, and BlephEx treatments, and has fitted over 2,000 scleral lenses.
dr-mital-patel.image_alt: Dr. Mital Patel, OD - Optometrist at Classic Vision Care

ankit-patel.name: Ankit Patel
ankit-patel.title: Practice Co-Founder, Author & Podcast Host
ankit-patel.bio: Ankit Patel is the co-founder of Classic Vision Care and founder of My Business Care Team (MyBCAT). He is the author of Optometry Redefined: Master Resourcing and Performance and host of the Optometrists Building Empires podcast. Ankit writes about the communities CVC serves and helps patients make the most of their vision benefits.
ankit-patel.image_alt: Ankit Patel - Co-Founder of Classic Vision Care

book.title: Optometry Redefined: Master Resourcing and Performance
